Class Main

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
Main
public class Main extends javafx.application.Application
This is a JavaFx GUI for controlling the TR3D Arm Wresting Demo for Michigan Scientific Corporation.

  • Method Details

    • setOffsets

      public void setOffsets()
      sets the offsets in all axes

    • resetOffsets

      public void resetOffsets()
      Resets the offsets to 0 in all axes. It also disables the bell.

    • calibrateAll

      public void calibrateAll()
      Sets the sensitivities in all axes and displays them.

    • updateValues

      public void updateValues() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Reads the ADCs and updates the voltages, lbs, labels, LED strip, and triggers the bell if a high score is broken.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the led strip fails to write or the ADCs fail to read
      InterruptedException - if the current thread is interrupted

    • ledRainbow

      public void ledRainbow() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Displays a rainbow on the led strip.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the led strip fails to write
      InterruptedException - if the current thread is interrupted

    • ledScale

      public void ledScale​(float scalar) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Displays the scale on the LED strip with a green to red gradient.
      Parameters:
      scalar - number between 0 and 1 that represents the percentage of LEDs enabled
      Throws:
      IOException - if the led strip fails to write
      InterruptedException - if the current thread is interrupted

    • start

      public void start​(javafx.stage.Stage stage) throws FileNotFoundException, IOException, com.pi4j.io.i2c.I2CFactory.UnsupportedBusNumberException, InterruptedException
      Initializes the adcs, led strips, sets up the scences, and starts the application.
      Specified by:
      start in class javafx.application.Application
      Parameters:
      stage - main stage for the GUI
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if it can't find the fair.png
      IOException - if it can't communicate with the ADCs
      com.pi4j.io.i2c.I2CFactory.UnsupportedBusNumberException - if the I2c bus doesn't exist
      InterruptedException - if the thread gets interrupted

    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args)
      Launches the JavaFx application.
      Parameters:
      args - command line arguments
